title: Issue with the new store I didn't really notice until now.
body:
Way back in the old store when you went to buy something, when you clicked on the item it would show you how much IP/RP you would be left with if you went through the purchase. Now i just bought 2 rune pages because it was a 2 for 1 deal (still too god damn expensive LUL) because i needed one for something I want to play. I was going to check and see if I did buy the rune page how much IP i would be left with and if i would have enough to buy camille when she comes out. Well when i went and clicked the IP button it purchased them, it didn't tell me how much IP i would have left. I don't really mind, I knew I would have enough to buy camille and I want to take advantage of the rune page sale anyway. But why remove a feature that meant customers didn't have to do math on their own?

Why remove convenience?

replies.body:
This feature wasn't removed and you'll find the balances *after purchase* without having to hit any sort of purchase button now after you view an item. It's listed at the bottom for both IP and RP (if applicable):

http://image.prntscr.com/image/ad3d0e6332974cbc9ec75c8c36366ac2.png

Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm still on the legacy client. If it's in the new client i'll just take your word for it.
However i can buy a champion by going to their champion page and hitting "unlock champion" and i get a screen much like the old store that shows me how much i will have left if i were to buy the champion

Thanks though.
